text: The 2022 FIFA World Cup opening ceremony takes place on 20 novembre at Al-Bayt Stadium in Al-Khor, Qatar. It will be broadcast at 18:00 UTC+03 (local time), prior to the match between hosts Qatar and Ecuador on first day of Group A. Italian artistic director Marco Balich, who has already worked on a number of Olympic Games ceremonies, is in charge of organising the show. A series of concerts is also planned, featuring Jeon Jungkook, the South Korean singer of BTS, and the American rapper Lil Boy, two names that have been confirmed. Balvin, Major Lazer and Enrique Iglesias. == Speakers == * Morgan Freeman, American actor; * Marcel Desailly, 1998 world champion with France, came to present the World Cup trophy; * Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, Emir of Qatar. == References == Category:2022 FIFA World Cup
